block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: I did something different with my video today. Please let me know in the comments if you like it. Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect with each other through origami and paper folding. Subscribe to my channel to receive something new every week. Today we are learning how to fold an Icosahedral Skeleton by Miyuki Kawamura. This model is really pretty and I know you'll enjoy it. Please find the time stamp of the tutorial below. It's to help you jump through the tutorial quickly. 00:09 How to fold the Module 02:21 Module folding Time-lapse 02:40 Assembling the Base of the Model 04:35 Assembling the Middle of the Model 06:34 Assembling the Top of the Model Thanks for watching.
